Mission.Author: Histidine
Mission.Description: Abbreviated tutorial for the campaign. Not to be played independently.
Mission.Name: Quick Tutorial

TriggerLogic.Name: Custom Action
TriggerLogic.CodeStr:
local units = GG.mission.FindUnitsInGroup("Gaia") for unitID in pairs(units) do Spring.TransferUnit(unitID, Spring.GetGaiaTeamID(), false) end
--Spring.SetGameRulesParam("tutorial_has_next_button", 1)
GG.CommandLocker.LockCMD(CMD.MOVE) GG.CommandLocker.LockCMD(CMD.SELFD) GG.CommandLocker.LockCMD(31109) -- raw move

TriggerLogic.Name: Custom Comm Spawn
TriggerLogic.CodeStr:
if not Spring.GetModOptions().commandertypes then GG.mission.ExecuteTriggerByName("Spawn Comm Fallback") else local teamID = 0 local teamInfo = teamID and select(7, Spring.GetTeamInfo(teamID)) if teamInfo and teamInfo.staticcomm then local commanderName = teamInfo.staticcomm local commanderLevel = teamInfo.staticcomm_level or 1 local commanderProfile = GG.ModularCommAPI.GetCommProfileInfo(commanderName) local startUnit = commanderProfile.baseUnitDefID
local x, z = 3150, 3580 local y = Spring.GetGroundHeight(x, z) local unitID = GG.DropUnit(startUnit, x, y, z, 0, teamID, _, _, _, _, _, GG.ModularCommAPI.GetProfileIDByBaseDefID(startUnit), teamInfo and tonumber(teamInfo.static_level), true) Spring.SetUnitNoSelect(unitID, true) Spring.SetUnitNeutral(unitID, true) GG.mission.AddUnitGroup(unitID,"Comm") end end

Spring.SendCommands("info 0") if WG.EconomyPanel then --WG.EconomyPanel.SetEconomyPanelVisibility(false) end
-- force start when testing from Mission Editor -- not needed if run from Chobby campaign (a widget will do this) if not Spring.GetModOptions().commandertypes then Spring.SendCommands("forcestart") end

TriggerLogic.Name: Add Objective
TriggerLogic.Description: Learn the bare basics of playing Zero-K. Follow the provided instructions at each step.
TriggerLogic.Title: Complete Quick Tutorial

TriggerLogic.CodeStr:
-- hide economy panel if WG.EconomyPanel then --WG.EconomyPanel.SetEconomyPanelVisibility(false) end
--Spring.SelectUnitArray({}, false)

TriggerLogic.Name: GUI Message (Persistent)
TriggerLogic.Message:
\255\255\255\0\Zoom the camera\008 to your \255\255\255\0\commander\008 to the left.
+ Pan the camera with \255\0\255\0\arrow keys\008, the \255\0\255\0\screen edge\008 or \255\0\255\0\middle mouse\008 button. + Zoom with \255\0\255\0\scrollwheel\008 or \255\0\255\0\Page Up and Page Down\008.

TriggerLogic.CodeStr: Spring.SetGameRulesParam("tutorial_stage", 1)

TriggerLogic.Name: Custom Marker
TriggerLogic.CodeStr: if WG.CustomMarker then WG.CustomMarker.AddPoint("cameraTarget", 3150, 3580, "Zoom in here") end

TriggerLogic.Message: Select your commander by \255\0\255\0\left clicking\008 on it.

\255\0\255\0\Right click\008 on the ground to issue a \255\255\255\0\move\008 command. Move your commander to the marker to the right.
(Make sure your commander is selected)

TriggerLogic.CodeStr: Spring.SetGameRulesParam("tutorial_stage", 3) GG.CommandLocker.UnlockCMD(CMD.MOVE) GG.CommandLocker.UnlockCMD(31109) -- raw move

TriggerLogic.Name: Custom Marker
TriggerLogic.CodeStr: if WG.CustomMarker then WG.CustomMarker.RemovePoint("selectComm") WG.CustomMarker.AddPoint("destination1", 3610, 3580, "Right-click to move here") end
Spring.SetGameRulesParam("tutorial_stage", 2) local unitID = GG.mission.FindUnitInGroup("Comm") Spring.SetUnitNoSelect(unitID, false)

TriggerLogic.Name: Custom Marker
TriggerLogic.CodeStr: if WG.CustomMarker then WG.CustomMarker.RemovePoint("cameraTarget") WG.CustomMarker.AddPoint("selectComm", 3150, 3580, "Left click to select", "small") end

TriggerLogic.Name: Custom Action
TriggerLogic.CodeStr: Spring.SetGameRulesParam("tutorial_stage", 4) GG.CommandLocker.LockCMD(CMD.MOVE) GG.CommandLocker.LockCMD(31109) -- raw move

TriggerLogic.Name: GUI Message (Persistent)
TriggerLogic.Message: You have found three friendly Glaives. Select all your units by \255\0\255\0\left clicking\008 and \255\255\255\0\dragging a box\008 around them.

TriggerLogic.Name: Custom Marker
TriggerLogic.CodeStr: if WG.CustomMarker then WG.CustomMarker.RemovePoint("destination1") WG.CustomMarker.AddPoint("boxSelect", 3610, 3580, "Drag a box to select all units", "small") end
Spring.SetGameRulesParam("tutorial_stage", 5) GG.CommandLocker.UnlockCMD(CMD.MOVE) GG.CommandLocker.UnlockCMD(31109) -- raw move

TriggerLogic.Message:
Draw a \255\255\255\0\line formation\008 with the mouse. Move your units into the indicated circles.
+ \255\0\255\0\Right click\008 and drag to draw a line + Release right click
(Make sure all your units are selected)

TriggerLogic.Name: Custom Marker
TriggerLogic.CodeStr: if WG.CustomMarker then WG.CustomMarker.RemovePoint("boxSelect") WG.CustomMarker.AddPoint("lineMove1", 4245, 3445, "Right-click, drag from here...") WG.CustomMarker.AddPoint("lineMove2", 4140, 3745, "...to here and let go") end

TriggerLogic.Name: Custom Action
TriggerLogic.CodeStr: Spring.SetGameRulesParam("tutorial_stage", 6) GG.CommandLocker.LockCMD(CMD.MOVE) GG.CommandLocker.LockCMD(31109) -- raw move GG.CommandLocker.UnlockCMD(CMD.ATTACK)

TriggerLogic.Name: GUI Message (Persistent)
TriggerLogic.Message:
\255\0\255\0\Right click\008 to \255\255\255\0\attack\008 and destroy the enemy Storage.
(Make sure your units are selected)

TriggerLogic.Name: Custom Marker
TriggerLogic.CodeStr: if WG.CustomMarker then WG.CustomMarker.ClearPoints() WG.CustomMarker.AddPoint("target1", 4855, 3580, "Right-click to attack") end

TriggerLogic.Name: Custom Action
TriggerLogic.CodeStr: Spring.SetGameRulesParam("tutorial_stage", 7) GG.CommandLocker.LockCMD(CMD.ATTACK) GG.CommandLocker.UnlockCMD(30100) -- area mex GG.CommandLocker.UnlockCMD(CMD.REPAIR)

TriggerLogic.Name: GUI Message (Persistent)
TriggerLogic.Message:
Build a \255\0\255\255\Metal Extractor\008 on the \255\255\255\0\metal spot\008. This will supply \255\255\255\0\metal\008 needed for construction.
+ Click the \255\255\255\0\Area Mex\008 command + \255\0\255\0\Left click\008 on the metal spot
(Make sure your commander is selected)

TriggerLogic.Name: Custom Marker
TriggerLogic.CodeStr: if WG.CustomMarker then WG.CustomMarker.RemovePoint("target1") WG.CustomMarker.AddPoint("mex", 5112, 3592, "Build a Metal Extractor", "small") end

TriggerLogic.Name: Custom Action
TriggerLogic.CodeStr:
if WG.ChiliHighlight then WG.ChiliHighlight.ClearControls()
-- highlight area mex WG.ChiliHighlight.AddControlFunc("orderTab", function() if WG.IntegralMenu.GetCommandButtonPosition(30100) then return {} end return {WG.IntegralMenu.GetTabPosition("orders")} end, nil, true)
WG.ChiliHighlight.AddControlFunc("areaMexButton", function() return {WG.IntegralMenu.GetCommandButtonPosition(30100)} end, nil, true) end
if WG.EconomyPanel then --WG.EconomyPanel.SetEconomyPanelVisibility(true) end

TriggerLogic.Name: Custom Action
TriggerLogic.CodeStr: Spring.SetGameRulesParam("tutorial_stage", 8) GG.CommandLocker.LockCMD(30100) -- area mex

TriggerLogic.Name: GUI Message (Persistent)
TriggerLogic.Message:
Build a \255\0\255\255\Solar Collector\008. This will supply \255\255\255\0\energy\008 needed for construction and ability upkeep.
+ Click the \255\255\255\0\Econ\008 tab in the menu + Click the Solar Collector button + \255\0\255\0\Left click\008 on the ground to place the building
(Make sure your commander is selected. If you accidentally stop the construction, \255\0\255\0\right click\008 the building frame to resume.)

TriggerLogic.Name: Custom Marker
TriggerLogic.CodeStr: if WG.CustomMarker then WG.CustomMarker.RemovePoint("mex") WG.CustomMarker.AddPoint("solar", 5112, 3464, "Build a Solar Collector", "small") end

TriggerLogic.Name: Custom Action
TriggerLogic.CodeStr: Spring.SetGameRulesParam("tutorial_stage", 9) local unitID = GG.mission.FindUnitInGroup("Comm") GG.GiveFacplop(unitID)

TriggerLogic.Name: GUI Message (Persistent)
TriggerLogic.Message:
Build a \255\0\255\255\Cloakbot Factory\008. Your commander can place one factory for free, as shown by the overhead icon.
+ Click the \255\255\255\0\Factory\008 tab in the menu + Click the Cloakbot Factory button + \255\0\255\0\Left click\008 on the ground to place the building
(Make sure your commander is selected)
TIP: Rotate structures with [ and ], or left click and drag.

TriggerLogic.Name: Custom Marker
TriggerLogic.CodeStr: if WG.CustomMarker then WG.CustomMarker.RemovePoint("solar") WG.CustomMarker.AddPoint("factory", 5102, 3750, "Build a factory", "small") end

TriggerLogic.Name: Custom Marker
TriggerLogic.CodeStr: if WG.CustomMarker then WG.CustomMarker.RemovePoint("factory") WG.CustomMarker.AddPoint("assist", 5102, 3750, "Right click to assist the factory", "small") end

TriggerLogic.Name: Custom Action
TriggerLogic.CodeStr: Spring.SetGameRulesParam("tutorial_stage", 10) GG.CommandLocker.UnlockCMD(CMD.MOVE) GG.CommandLocker.LockCMD(CMD.STOP) GG.CommandLocker.UnlockCMD(CMD.GUARD) GG.CommandLocker.LockCMD(CMD.REPAIR)

TriggerLogic.Name: GUI Message (Persistent)
TriggerLogic.Message:
\255\0\255\0\Right click\008 on the factory to \255\255\255\0\assist\008 it. Assist is the most effective way to speed up unit production.
(Make sure your commander is selected)

TriggerLogic.Name: Custom Action
TriggerLogic.CodeStr: if WG.ChiliHighlight then WG.ChiliHighlight.ClearControls() end

TriggerLogic.Name: Remove Custom Marker
TriggerLogic.CodeStr: if WG.CustomMarker then WG.CustomMarker.RemovePoint("assist") end

TriggerLogic.Name: Custom Action
TriggerLogic.CodeStr: Spring.SetGameRulesParam("tutorial_stage", 11) GG.CommandLocker.LockCMD(CMD.GUARD)

TriggerLogic.Name: GUI Message (Persistent)
TriggerLogic.Message:
Build three \255\0\255\255\Glaives\008 with your factory.
+ Select your factory + \255\0\255\0\Left click\008 the Glaive button three times

TriggerLogic.Name: Custom Action

TriggerLogic.CodeStr:
Spring.SetGameRulesParam("tutorial_stage", 12)
GG.CommandLocker.UnlockCMD(CMD.MOVE) GG.CommandLocker.UnlockCMD(31109) -- raw move GG.CommandLocker.UnlockCMD(CMD.ATTACK) GG.CommandLocker.UnlockCMD(CMD.FIGHT) GG.CommandLocker.UnlockCMD(CMD.STOP) --GG.CommandLocker.UnlockCMD(30100) -- area mex

TriggerLogic.Name: Custom Action
TriggerLogic.CodeStr: if WG.ChiliHighlight then WG.ChiliHighlight.ClearControls() end

TriggerLogic.Name: GUI Message (Persistent)
TriggerLogic.Message: Use \255\255\255\0\attack move\008 to \255\255\255\0\destroy all enemies\008 to the right. Select your units, press \255\0\255\0\A\008 and left click to issue an attack move order.

TriggerLogic.Name: Custom Marker
TriggerLogic.CodeStr: if WG.CustomMarker then WG.CustomMarker.AddPoint("target2", 7100, 3570, "Press A and left click to attack move") end

Spring.SetGameRulesParam("tutorial_show_next_button", 0) Spring.SendLuaMenuMsg("mission_complete_tutorial_quick")
if GG.MissionGameOver then GG.MissionGameOver(true) else GG.mission.ExecuteTriggerByName("Victory Fallback") end

TriggerLogic.Message: Well done. You now know the basics of Zero-K.

TriggerLogic.Name: Remove Custom Marker
TriggerLogic.CodeStr: WG.CustomMarker.RemovePoint("target2")

TriggerLogic.Name: Custom Action
TriggerLogic.CodeStr: local unitID = GG.mission.FindUnitInGroup("Comm") Spring.SetUnitNoSelect(unitID, true)
